name: Space Aliens (Forggio)
description:
Space Aliens is a simple first person shooter game made in Unreal Engine 4. You goal is to fight waves of aliens on a space station in order to get enough points to win.

Sound effects by Kenney: https://kenney.n

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

LowPoly Models by Quaternius https://quaternius.com
